title: Projects
text:
1. LVDCS: Minimising Doubts in Distance Learning

Lecture Video Doubt Clarification System is an interactive, real-time user query response system for e-learning videos utilizing Transformers, LLMs and CV
Visual-language task for natural interaction with videos, aiming to increase the understanding of the lecture video content
With the help of lecture videos and their corresponding transcripts, doubt clarification is performed, taking into consideration domain knowledge
Repository






2. NSE Market Data Analysis

Developed visualisation charts and generated buy/sell signals for real time NSE market data from Moneycontrol
Open Interest of Calls and Puts were analyzed using a Stacked Grouped Bar Chart using PyPlot
This method of visualisation is not available with any established market information providers like Opstra, DefineEdge and Sensibull (Zerodha)
Specific Data related to Index (Nifty / Nifty Bank) namely LTP, VWAP, Put Call Ratio (PCR), Change in PCR, Open interest (OI) and Change in OI were captured every 5 mins to generate Buy / Sell signals
















3. Market Basket Analysis

Analysed customer buying patterns using XGBoost, RFC and Logistic Regression to increase grocery store sales
Repository



4. Text Summarisation of Literature Paper

NLP based system for literature paper summarisation via extractive summarisation
Repository



5. Yet Another MapReduce

Implemented Hadoopâ€™s MapReduce in Python using Socket Programming for master-worker node communication, supporting custom input, mapper and reducer files, with adjustable worker node count for read, write or map reduce operations
Repository

I currently work as an ML Engineer at Bosch Global Software Technologies, focusing on poles and boom gates detection for ADAS system in autonomous vehicles. My role involves designing pipelines for data preparation, network training, and enhancing object detection accuracy across different camera types. Previously, as an MLOps Intern at Bosch, I worked on improving traffic light detection for underrepresented classes and streamlined ML pipelines using Azure ML.
With hands-on experience in AI/ML tools, Iâ€™ve contributed to real-world projects, such as autonomous driving, enhancing various ADAS applications. My interests lie broadly in deep learning and natural language processing, and I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex challenges and creating impactful solutions.
Find my projects, publications and resume here!
